Title:
Polyancora globosa gen. et sp. nov., an aeroaquatic fungus
from Malaysian peat swamp forests
Abstract:
During an investigation of submerged leaves and twigs
sampled from tropical peat swamp forests located in Peninsular Malaysia,
an anamorphic fungus not attributable to a described genus was detected
and isolated in pure culture. Conidial ontogeny was thoroughly studied
and illustrated both with light and scanning electron microscopy, which
revealed a unique conidial morphology. Analysis of partial nuLSU rDNA
and ITS data revealed a phylogenetic position within the Xylariales
(Ascomycota), but family affiliation remained unclear.
